item.title: Evolution of Web Application Architecture
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Web application architectures evolved more and more into service-orientation. A lot of different solutions for niche problems like queueing systems and NoSQL databases exist by now. I will show that we weren’t so wrong to walk this path and what we can learn from this for future system architectures.
item.content:encoded: Web application architectures evolved more and more into service-orientation. A lot of different solutions for niche problems like queueing systems and NoSQL databases exist by now. I will show that we weren’t so wrong to walk this path and what we can learn from this for future system architectures.
